Question
========
Sort the answers to proposition 2 (variable: proposition2) in descending order (from high to low) and the grades on the introduction to economics exam (variable: introduction_economics) in ascending order (from low to high). Write the grade of the 47th person (row 47) on the mathematics exam (variable: mathematics) (with 3 decimal places) in the answer box.

n.b. If in your file the variable names are in the first row, you need the 48th row.

* Download**: [SPSS file](eur-descriptive-220-en-data.sav), [CSV file](eur-descriptive-220-en-data.csv)


Solution
========
The correct answer is 4,319.
